analysis.summary: The review identifies several critical issues with the memory system, including inconsistent data presentation in real-time console monitoring dashboards, limited filtering and sorting capabilities on API endpoints, security vulnerabilities in API endpoints, ignoring rate limiting for API endpoints, potential single point of failure in MCP server management, insecure agent interception mechanisms, complex port management, resource overallocation and complexity in managing shared vs. personal memory files, insufficient logging mechanisms, lack of traceability and audit trails, excessive complexity in port management, inadequate conflict resolution strategies, insufficient security measures like data encryption and secure communication channels, poor agent verification processes, and the need for regular health checks to detect anomalies early.
